#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define FOR(i,b) for(typeof(b) i = 0; i<b; ++i)
#define FORR(i,a,b) for(typeof(b) i= a; i<=b; ++i)
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define x first
#define y second

using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
typedef pair<int,int> pii;

const ll mod = 1e9+7;
const int SIZE = 1e6+5;
const ll inf = 0x7fffffff;
ll a,b,r;
ll fib[SIZE];
//map<int,int> mtp;

void init()
{
    fib[0]=0;
    fib[1]=1;
    for(int i=2;i<SIZE;++i)
        fib[i]=(fib[i-1]+fib[i-2])%mod;

}

void solve()
{
if(r==1)
{
    cout<<a<<endl;
    return;
}
if(r==2)
{
    cout<<b<<endl;
    return;
}
ll ans=(b*fib[r-1]+a*fib[r-2])%mod;
cout<<ans<<endl;
return;}

int main()
{
    //ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    //cin.tie(0);
    int tt;
    init();
    //cin>>tt;
    scanf("%d",&tt);
    while(tt--)
    {
        //cin>>a>>b>>r;
        scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&a,&b,&r);
        solve();
    }
    return 0;
}
